q: Do I need a job offer before I apply for a work visa?
a: It depends on your destination. Some countries want you to have a job first, while others let you find work once you're there. We’ll break down the details for you.

q: What kind of jobs can I get abroad?
a: You can get a variety of jobs, from healthcare to the IT sector. Whether you’re looking for a part-time or full-time, we’ll help you with that.

q: Can I work while studying abroad?
a: Most countries allow you to work during your studies for a limited number of hours. We’ll help you find the right option for you to make it work with your schedule.

q: How can ViaCerta help me find a job abroad?
a: We make the job search easier by guiding you through everything—from finding opportunities to helping with interviews and visa info.

q: Are there countries with easier work visa processes?
a: Absolutely! Some countries have simpler processes. We’ll guide you to places where getting a work visa is a bit less complicated.
